root.name: Down in Flames
root.description: PC System RequirementsWindows PC (Win 98SE SP2, ME, XP, 2000)DirectX 9.0c or higherDirectX 9.0c supported video card capable of displaying 1024x768 resolution or higherRequires Microsoft .Net Framework 1.1 SP1 to be installed (Microsoft .Net Framework 1.1 SP1 installer included with game)600 Megabytes required free on hard drive
